name: Good Job
description:
Tired of doing a good job?? Well your boss doesn't care! The only way to get some respect and get off the island is to kill him in an all-out roguelike war.

MAIN FEATURES

POWER UP
Killing your boss would be no fun without superpowers. slow down time, jump outrageously high and dash your way across the fun sized map :) You might want to grab a life saver drink before they baddies end your run!

GUN PLAY
Did somebody say they wanted to shoot their boss in the face with an automatic rifle? no problem. We've got gun for that. Oh, and don't forget to stop by the work bench to upgrade.

ALL OUT WAR
There are no rounds. The patrol will spawn endlessly until you either die or complete your objective... Use everything at your disposal to take down the enemy and get off work!

BETTER WITH FRIENDS
How about killing your boss with a couple of your favorite coworkers? say less. You can play GOOD JOB with up to 4 friends and more planned for the future! :)
